name: Soul Builder
description:
A short worker/resource management game created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare game jam with the theme "Your Life is Currency". To construct the Temple of Souls, you'll have to make a few sacrifices. Play by dragging workers and resources into the appropriate slots to unlock and power new buildings.

Known issues:

  • No music/audio
  • Bug where workers keep working on the victory screen
